import { Component } from "react"; import { stayService } from "../services/stay-service"; export class StayDetails extends Component { state = { stay: null } componentDidMount() { this.loadStay() } loadStay = async () => { const { stayId } = this.props.match.params const stay = await stayService.getById(stayId) this.setState({ stay }) } getRate = () => { const rates = this.state.stay.reviews.map(review => review.avgRate) const sum = rates.reduce((acc, rate) => { acc += rate return acc }, 0) return sum / rates.length } getAmenityIcon(amenity) { switch (amenity) { case 'TV': return case 'Wifi': return case 'Air-conditioning': return case 'Smoking allowed': return case 'Pets allowed': return case 'Cooking basics': return default: return } } render() { const { stay } = this.state if (!stay) return

loading...

const { loc, capacity, desc, amenities, price, stayType, propertyType, reviews, name, host } = stay return (
